comment.author: 35551608@N08
comment._content: the third ship in the Us navies new steel navy,  a cruiser,commisoned in 1885, she was  hyprid of steel,steam and sail, and was in the original new navies squadron of evolution in 1889.  was the "C" in the "ABCD" fleet. this photo is after here sailing mast had been replaced with battle mast sometime around the spanish american war of 1898.
